Could we please add the following to test this after building?

```
make release_tests
cd release/tests/test_server
$SRC_DIR/bin/erl -s ts install -s ts smoke_test batch -s init stop
```

This is what they recommend in their [docs](http://erlang.org/doc/installation_guide/INSTALL.html#id57436) and use in their CI [script](https://github.com/erlang/otp/blob/b193b02b00f899791735586b31fc5cd1d7147c8b/.travis.yml#L38).
